#
# Autogenerated from /export/home/dicuccio/cpp-cmake/cpp-cmake.2015-01-24/src/connect/Makefile.xxconnect.lib
#
add_library(xxconnect
    ${SRC_CXX}
)

if (BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)

target_link_libraries(xxconnect
    connect xncbi
)

else()

if (HAVE_NCBI_C)

target_link_libraries(xxconnect
    connect xncbi
)

else()

target_link_libraries(xxconnect
    connect xncbi
)

endif()

endif()


target_link_libraries(xxconnect
    connect xncbi ${GNUTLS_LIBS} ${NETWORK_LIBS}
)
